General.Name: Namchow Chemical Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and processes edible and non-edible oil, frozen dough, and dish and laundry liquid detergent products in Taiwan, China, and Thailand. The company offers crystal soap, bar soap, liquid soap, powder, and tableware cleaning liquids, as well as antibacterial cleaning products, including allogeneic soap and hand washing products. It also provides frozen and instant noodles; ice products; and cooked rice and leisure foods, such as rice crackers. In addition, the company is involved in manufacturing and distribution of bakery products, including baking oils and frozen doughs; and provision of catering and management consulting services. It sells its products through grocery stores, supermarkets, pharmacies, convenience stores, distributors, retailers, online shopping, special distribution channels, etc. The company was formerly known as Namchow Chemical Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1952 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 100, Yanping North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 103
